about_the_game:
The All Mounts DLC is a pack for Kingdom of Atham that adds an array of new mount skins for players. This DLC currently includes 39 mount skins, allowing players to explore the vast world of Atham. With a dozen of unique mounts to choose from, personalize your adventure with whatever makes you look cool or fits your style. From a chicken, spider, deer, horse, and many more. Make your journey around Atham even more memorable with the Kingdom of Atham: All Mounts DLC!

All mounts are in-game as dropable loot not just from the DLC. The DLC allows you to switch the mount item's skins. Requires player level 10 to use your first mount so your skins will not be available until then.
detailed_description:
The All Mounts DLC is a pack for Kingdom of Atham that adds an array of new mount skins for players. This DLC currently includes 39 mount skins, allowing players to explore the vast world of Atham. With a dozen of unique mounts to choose from, personalize your adventure with whatever makes you look cool or fits your style. From a chicken, spider, deer, horse, and many more. Make your journey around Atham even more memorable with the Kingdom of Atham: All Mounts DLC!

All mounts are in-game as dropable loot not just from the DLC. The DLC allows you to switch the mount item's skins. Requires player level 10 to use your first mount so your skins will not be available until then.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core I5-7600 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: (Low Settings) SSD Recommended. Requirement are higher during EA development, Performance will be improved overtime!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core i7 9700k or AMD Ryzen 7 3700x or Equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2080 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: (Epic Settings) SSD Recommended. Requirement are higher during EA development, Performance will be improved overtime!

short_description: The All Mounts DLC is a pack for Kingdom of Atham that adds an array of new mount skins for players. This DLC currently includes 39 mount skins, allowing players to explore the vast world of Atham.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, German
*languages with full audio support
